heading: HR00857
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION (DEPED) TO IMPLEMENT TV-BASED LECTURES FOR ELEMENTARY AND HIGH SCHOOLS IN THE COUNTRY DURING THE COVID-19 PERIOD, USE THE FACILITIES OF TWO GOVERNMENT-OWNED TV STATIONS PTV 4 AND IBC 13 TELEVISION STATIONS TO SERVE AS TRANSMISSION VEHICLES FOR SUCH LECTURES AND ENSURE GOVERNMENT CONTINUES ON ITS TRACK TO ACHIEVE GOAL 4 QUALITY EDUCATION OF THE 17 SUSTAINABLE GOALS
status: Pending with the Committee on BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE since 2020-05-12
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00857
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION (DEPED) TO IMPLEMENT TV-BASED LECTURES FOR ELEMENTARY AND HIGH SCHOOLS IN THE COUNTRY DURING THE COVID-19 PERIOD, USE THE FACILITIES OF TWO GOVERNMENT-OWNED TV STATIONS PTV 4 AND IBC 13 TELEVISION STATIONS TO SERVE AS TRANSMISSION VEHICLES FOR SUCH LECTURES AND ENSURE GOVERNMENT CONTINUES ON ITS TRACK TO ACHIEVE GOAL 4 QUALITY EDUCATION OF THE 17 SUSTAINABLE GOALS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VILLARAZA-SUAREZ, ANNA MARIE
DATE FILED : 2020-05-12
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE ON 2020-05-12
